venue.name: Wild Rover Bar Boston - 1 Block from Faneuil Hall

item.description:
Free Food, Awesome Raffles & DJ EvaRedy

Hello everyone,

We are a group of three girlfriends  from the Boston area, Krista, Dana, & Danyel, hoping to make a difference in the lives of those affected by the bombing at the Boston Marathon. Although none of us know any of the victims, they are our fellow Americans and Bostonians. We are starting this non-profit fundraiser to support the wounded from the Boston Marathon by helping fund medical bills and long term health care, to demonstrate that with every charitable seed planted, a brighter memory develops.

We are hosting a Fun Fundraising Event at the Wild Rover, on May 11th at 7 pm featuring DJ EvaRedy for the people of Boston to come together and show love and support for the victims. We are a small city, but our love is unstoppable, strength is fierce, and our heart is open and full of courage.

Tickets are $20 to attend- which will be your donation and include one raffle ticket and includes free food.

Purchase your ticket here: http://bostoncampaign2013.eventbrite.com

TICKET CUT OFF DATE IS TOMOROW WED, MAY 8TH

Advance Ticket Purchase Required. No tickets sold at the door.

Visit our Event at Boston.com:
http://calendar.boston.com/boston_ma/events/show/322940963-boston-marathon-fundraiser-2013-includes-food-raffle

Some raffle prizes include:  $50 gift certificate to Lincoln Restaurant & Bar,  $50 gift certificate to Towne Restaurant & Bar, 2 one month passes to the Newbury Street Boston Sports Club (includes five 1 hour training sessions), $50 Manicure & Pedicure, 2 Starbuck gift bags, $55 Edible Arrangements gift certificate, Lucky Strike Gift Certificate, Firebrand Saints Restaurant & Bar gift certificate, Forever 21 Gift Card, Stats Restaurant & Bar gift card, 2 $1500 Elite Matchmaking Membership for 3 months of private matchmaking services and more.

The money raised from your contribution will be distributed evenly to those requiring long term health care. We are working with the health care coordinators of the Boston city hospitals.

If you cannot attend the actual event please make a donation at : http://fundly.com/the-boston-marathon-fund

Let's band together and make a difference for those injured and maimed who have a long recovery and huge medical bills ahead. We can help!

So Looking forward to seeing you all. Let's show Boston how much we love our city!

 

God Bless Boston and God Bless America

xoxo

group.name: The Cambridge and Boston Singles Meetup

item.name: Boston Marathon Fundraiser-Ticket Extension-FREE FOOD AWSOME RAFFLES
